title: Rito always so fail af
body: Rito.. last night i was afk on a flex 5vs5 right from the start of the game, so the guys did a remake (no harm for them).. let's say that i "accept" some kind of punishment.. BUT, you have to decide rito.... you either gonna take my points (-20) or you gonna give me 5 games of lower priority.. you can't have both...!!! seriously now.. don't be so selfish to want all the candies for yourself man... decide! points OR 5 games.. you really like to give the cancers to your players.. don't you?

replies.body:
What?  You lost the game hence -20 and you afked hence the 5 games in low priority.  

These are perfectly fair punishments that match the rules being broken. Also I'm pretty sure you need to afk/remake 2-3 times at least before it gives you low priority.
